程序包 com.skye.lover.view

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    CustomGridView3Column.OnItemClickListener
    item点击监听
    DynamicAddPictureContainer.OnClickAddPictureListener
    添加图片点击事件监听
    FaceContainer.OnFaceOprateListener
    表情操作事件监听
    FlowRadioGroup.OnCheckedChangeListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the checked radio button changed in this group.
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    CustomGridView3Column
    自定义gridview3列;用于在动态列表中显示一组图片
    DynamicAddPictureContainer
    动态添加图片容器
    FaceContainer  
    FlowRadioGroup
    可以放多种布局控件，能找到radiobutton
    FlowRadioGroup.LayoutParams
    This set of layout parameters defaults the width and the height of the children to ViewGroup.LayoutParams.WRAP_CONTENT when they are not specified in the XML file.
    InputView
    聊天输入
    LoadingDialog
    加载对话框
    ScalePhotoViewPager
    用于处理图片缩放崩溃;普通ViewPager中使用PhotoView，在缩放图片时，会报IllegalArgumentException异常， 网上说这是ViewPager的bug
    SquareImageView
    方形图片
    Topbar
    标题栏
    Topbar_ViewBinding
